original_text: The other things that happened while Jehoshaphat was king are written in a book. Hanani's son Jehu recorded all of them in his book, which is part of ‘The history of Israel's kings’.
korean_text: 이 외에 여호사밧의 시종 행적은 하나니의 아들 예후의 글에 다 기록되었고 그 글은 이스라엘 열왕기에 올랐더라

sentences.original_text: The other things that happened while Jehoshaphat was king
sentences.korean_translation: 여호사밧이 왕이었을 때 일어난 다른 일들은

sentences.original_text: Hanani's son Jehu recorded all of them
sentences.korean_translation: 하나니의 아들 여호가 그 모든 것을 기록했다

sentences.original_text: which is part of 'The history of Israel's kings'
